title: Dark Fantasy Orchesta Vol 2
description: A collection of dark and moody orchestral works in a AAA, Hollywood soundtrack style and quality level, using state of the art samples and mixing techniques. This collection has a varied but aesthetically unified sound.
longDescription:
A collection of dark and moody orchestral works in a AAA, Hollywood soundtrack style and quality level, using state of the art samples and mixing techniques. This collection has a varied but aesthetically unified sound, perfect for dark fantasy game soundtracks. 


Listen to the sampler preview here!
